content: the jumbo gnome crochet pattern is a fun and satisfying project that creates a bold charming statement piece for your home décor with its sturdy construction weighted base and classic gnome details this design is perfect for seasonal decorating gifting or displaying year-round > **free step-by-step video tutorial is available here 1 ** this pattern includes two size options jumbo size approximately 65 cm 25 5 tall made using worsted weight yarn held double or bulky weight yarn smaller size approximately 45 cm 17 5 tall made using a single strand of worsted weight yarn both sizes follow the same bottom-up construction the legs are crocheted separately then joined seamlessly to continue the body and head as one piece the nose beard hands and hat are crocheted separately and sewn on to finish the gnome a full step-by-step video tutorial is included to guide you through the entire process making this pattern approachable for confident beginners and enjoyable for experienced crocheters alike finished size jumbo 65 cm/25 5 smaller 45 cm/ 17 5 difficulty intermediate written in standard american terms yarn #4 any worsted weight yarn will work for this pattern in colors dark grey light grey white cream and red i used lionbrand pound of love 100% acrylic 454gr/16oz 932m/1020yds the quantities needed are as follows jumbo gnome 65cm dark grey- 120gr/ 246m/ 269yds light grey- 153gr/ 313m/ 343yds red- 210gr/ 430m/ 470yds white- 50gr/ 102 5m/ 112yds cream- 6gr/ 12m/ 13 5yds small gnome 45cm dark grey- 50gr/ 102 5m/ 112yds light grey- 60gr/ 123m/ 134 5yds red- 50gr/ 102 5/ 112yds white- 40gr/ 82m/ 90yds cream- 3gr/ 6m/ 7yds hook 6 mm and 5 5 mm for the jumbo version and 5 mm and 4 5 mm for the smaller version or any suitable hook size materials tapestry needle a pair of scissors poly-fiber filling poly-pellets stitch marker pencils sushi chopsticks or electricity wire pair of socks thinner ones gauge not important for this project video link- https
